ygData.subject: Re: Bloodstained mantle
ygData.msgSnippet: ... At level 38, I m just now looking to replace my BS Mantle with carnal pauldrons (no drop shoulders with +dex found in solB).  It s served me well for a
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 9 Dec 1999, Papa Legba wrote:

> Off the equipment thread: I acquired a blood stained mantle recently.
> (with my cleric) I can't decide whethere I should give it to my bard,
> or to the warrior in my cleric's party.

At level 38, I'm just now looking to replace my BS Mantle with carnal
pauldrons (no drop shoulders with +dex found in solB). It's served me
well for a very, very long time. For a warrior, I would think they'd
prefer shoulders with a little more AC. I tend to lean toward stats over
AC (looks too, naturally), as I am never under fire like the tanks.
Things attack me because I try to mez them, or because they just woke up
from being mez'd. I know my role in a group, and taking hits is no longer
part of it.

Athren Notechaser
